Name: Student Study Guide to accompany Physics

ReviewList.Text: I bought this book thinking it will help me because I’m taking physics and I found NO help because it contains no help. The problems and answers in this book do not even go with the text book. Please I write reviews because I found reviews to be helpful when I need to buy merchandise on the internet. DON’T WAST YOUR MONEY ON THIS BOOK.

The solutions guide was helpful in that it demonstrated, step-by-step examples of how to solve problems. I would like to see more problems covered or at least, all the "starred" problems covered. The textbook wasn't a great physics book so I expected better examples in the solutions manual. And to the publishers; Please remember that this book is what students use every day as their main teaching source. The 1 hr. a day of in class time does not cut it. Students need to SEE examples clearly before they can become critical thinkers and apply that knowledge.
Please don't waste your money on this one! This is a poorly written textbook and was not helpful at all. The author gave very few examples in each chapter for review. I was very disappointed.
